product_name: Kelty Bug Blocker Shelter - Large - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The large Kelty Bug Blocker Shelter won't let mosquitoes, hot sunshine or light showers spoil the party. Big enough to set up over a picnic table, it opens wide with both a front and back door.
short_description: The large Kelty Bug Blocker Shelter won't let mosquitoes, hot sunshine or light showers spoil the party. Big enough to set up over a picnic table, it opens wide with both a front and back door.
